Description: Ostracon, large section of the body of a pale-red pottery meat-jar, the fabric is partially grey in section and contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and faint traces of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393626) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393626)
